author: Douglas Ernst
title: Alec Baldwin bashes millions of Americans, says only 'mentally ill' will vote for Trump
description: Alec Baldwin is convinced that only "mentally ill" Americans will vote for President Trump's reelection in November.
content:
Alec Baldwin is convinced that only “mentally ill” Americans will vote for President Trump’s reelection in November.
The liberal actor-activist pivoted from his 2019 stance that voters took “poison pills of racist hatred” before voting for Mr. Trump, now mai… [+1745 chars]
